event.title: included the town from David Schuyler and others in 1756

data.event: John Tunnicliff purchased 12,000 acres (49 km2) of a patent that included the town from David Schuyler and others in 1756, but had to abandon attempts to settle the town until after the French and Indian War.
The first settlements were made around 1769 near Angel Hill.

event.title: was formed from the Town of Richfield in 1799

data.event: The town was formed from the Town of Richfield in 1799.
